title: What is Magnetism for Weight Loss and How Does It Work?
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the focus is on the technique of Magnetism and how it can be used for weight loss. Prior to this, the text covers several topics such as self-hypnosis, the Trabona Method for balancing the body, and how to deal with Burn Out. The author also introduces the concept of muscular preferences and how to identify the different types of personality associated with them. The text concludes with exercises on fluidification, balancing the HPA axis, and the use of sounds and metacommunicational codes in therapy. The author emphasizes the importance of treating Magnetism as a sacred practice and warns against using verbal suggestions excessively. This technique can be used for a variety of goals.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the techniques presented in this text offer a variety of ways to achieve different goals, such as weight loss, quitting smoking, overcoming allergies, and increasing sensitivity. From the glass of water technique to Indian self-hypnosis, there are various practices to explore. It is important to approach magnetism and hypnosis with reverence and to adapt to the individual's preferences and needs. Practicing exercises regularly, such as the mirror exercise of de-identification, can help us put away false identifications and patterns and explore our true essence.
